title: Irreducible Polynomial
content: A polynomial that cannot be factored into lower degree polynomials over ℤ.

title: Function F_f(n)
content: F_f(n) = greatest prime dividing any f(m) for 1 ≤ m ≤ n. Central function in the problem.

title: Nagell-Ricci Bound (1922)
content: F_f(n) ≫ n log n for irreducible f of degree ≥ 2. First non-trivial lower bound.

title: Erdős Bound (1952)
content: F_f(n) ≫ n(log n)^{log log log n}. Improved using sieve methods.

title: Tenenbaum Bound (1990)
content: F_f(n) ≫ n exp((log n)^c) for some c > 0. Currently the best rigorous bound.

title: Polynomial Growth Conjectures (Open)
content: F_f(n) ≫ n^{1+c} for some c > 0, or even ≫ n^d where d = deg(f). Both remain OPEN.

title: Algebraic Connection
content: Distribution of prime divisors of f(m) relates to splitting of primes in ℚ[x]/(f) via Chebotarev.

title: Problem Summary
content: OPEN: Best known bound n exp((log n)^c) (Tenenbaum). Conjectured n^{1+c} or n^d remains unproved. Large gap between bounds.
